text: Ra juna manisaharule kuphra gare, uniharuka karmaharuko udaharana yasto cha jastai nirjana maidanama baluvako kana, ki tirkha'ekole pani samjhos. Yahamsam'ma ki jaba usako samu a'umcha, ta tyasale kehi pani pa'umdaina ra allahala'i nai aphno nikata dekhdacha jasale usala'i usako hisaba purapura cukta garidincha. Ra allaha sighra hisaba garnevala cha
